Review.Titre: so i purchased your responsive pro…
Review.Contenu: so i purchased your responsive pro yesterday and can not now login to the help desk as it says usermane email unrecognised,,, I bought this for the auction template and when loading the plugins to my wp there is no auction template... i have sent an email to your priority support which appears to be non existent.... if i purchaes something i expect it to be as described,,,, i can now do nothing and you appear to not really have priority support at all, so again it looks like another wordpress plugin company that has no cares for its customers and just takes your money without regard for customers.to top this off your password reminder form does not work 4 times I have sent a password remindr in 24 hours and still no replyEvery time i try and download a template under  my pro package it says not valid and takes me to the buy pro page..... I have already BOUGHT THE PRO!!!are you people really that bad!   It appears so!Your support  portal,,, you know the one,, the one where you offer priority support  throws back another  cannot login due to invalid email or password lol...and it is also impossible to logout of your site and i have tried this on six different browsers and all the same!

Based on upgrades to the plug-ins my site stopped working. Upon opening up a ticket the support staff addressed the issues by providing an interim patch and some code that could be applied. They also provided guidance for some configuration changes that I had made when trying to identify a solution when the site originally broke.
I am new. I am still testing making my own website

Been using Cyberchimps themes for years and recenty purchased their Responsive Pro package in their Black Friday offer. I was a bit worried about the new system but it was a lot easier than I expected.Thankfully email support is pretty quick too, which is a bonus.

True to its name, the theme is highly responsive and adapts well to various screen sizes. Even for someone relatively new to WordPress, like me, navigating and customizing the CyberChimps theme was not difficult. The theme's performance is good. It's optimized for speed and doesn't compromise on quality. Pages load quickly.

UPDATE:The company got back to me, demonstrated they clearly understood my issue, and gave me step-by-step instructions to fix. Much happier to give it a higher rating now.I wanted this to work out but it really didn't. The link for the download didn't work - it was missing code. When I emailed support I received a message (18 hours after mine) asking me to give them admin privileges. When I sent a message asking for more information, I got nothing. And I can't do what I want to do with my theme until I figure this out. I'm very disappointed. At this point I'd take my money back so I can get a pro theme that works and has more reliable service.

Review.Titre: The problem arose with a theme that I bought very cheaply.
Review.Contenu: The problem arose with a theme that I bought very cheaply. Elementor could not work in classic mode but had to go to safe mode.Since I informed support about the problem, the very next day I received an update for that topic and the problem with elementor was solved.Thank you for your support and urgent response to the problemGreetings, Tale, Serbia, Belgrade

Review.Titre: The Responsive WordPress Theme is a…
Review.Contenu: The Responsive WordPress Theme is a game-changer for anyone seeking a seamless and visually appealing website across devices. Its adaptability ensures a flawless experience on various screen sizes, from desktops to smartphones. The user-friendly customization options make it easy to mold the theme to your specific needs without sacrificing design integrity. Navigating through its features is intuitive, even for those new to website development. The clean and modern aesthetic caters to diverse industries, providing a professional look without compromising functionality. Whether you're a seasoned developer or a novice, this theme's versatility and responsiveness make it a standout choice. It's a reliable companion for crafting websites that leave a lasting impression on visitors.

i have a wonderful experience working with you. sincery, your coaching and your assistance help me install simple as possible the plugin a bought to your company. in a few minutes, i succeed to launch my web site. thanks to you an receive my encouragement
Great product. Nothing else I’ve tried has been as easy or reliable. Thank you!

I recently integrated the Trustpilot WordPress plugin into my website, and I am beyond impressed with its seamless functionality and the positive impact it has had on my online presence. Here's why I'm giving it a well-deserved five-star rating:1. Easy Integration: The installation process was a breeze. Even for someone with limited technical knowledge, setting up the Trustpilot plugin on my WordPress site was straightforward. It seamlessly integrated with my existing design without any hiccups.2. User-Friendly Interface: Trustpilot's interface within the WordPress dashboard is intuitive and user-friendly. Navigating through the settings and options is a walk in the park. It provides a hassle-free experience for managing and customizing review displays on my website.3. Customization Options: One of the standout features is the level of customization it offers. I can tailor the appearance of the Trustpilot reviews to match my website's aesthetics perfectly. This flexibility is crucial for maintaining a cohesive and professional look.4. Real-Time Updates: Trustpilot ensures that my website visitors have access to the most up-to-date reviews. The plugin automatically syncs with Trustpilot, displaying real-time feedback from customers. This dynamic feature helps build trust and credibility with potential customers.5. Increased Credibility: Trustpilot's presence on my website has undeniably boosted my business's credibility. Visitors can easily access authentic reviews, enhancing their confidence in the products or services I offer. This increased trust has translated into higher conversion rates.In conclusion, the Trustpilot WordPress plugin is a game-changer for anyone looking to leverage the power of customer reviews. Its seamless integration, user-friendly interface, customization options, real-time updates, and the positive impact on credibility make it an essential tool for online businesses. I wholeheartedly recommend this plugin to fellow website owners who are serious about enhancing their online reputation. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

So far excellent!  I have built several websites over the years as a self-taught novice and decided to seek a new Theme and templates.  Cyberchimp was by far the best that I found and the price is very competetive.  I am sure that I will soon be upgrading from single site licence and using this theme on my othe domains.

Review.Titre: Easy to use, excellent selection of starter templates!
Review.Contenu: I have a test site where I try out Wordpress themes and plugins before installing them on a working site. The Responsive Theme and plugin from CyberChimps makes the task simple to do. And, the 150+ starter templates ensure I can always see what the end result will look like no matter what subject I need to build a site around.
I had a question and it was fully answered within 24 hours by email. I can't imagine better customer service than this.

Review.Titre: I have been a Cyberchimps customer for…
Review.Contenu: I have been a Cyberchimps customer for about three years, I own a few of their plugins and themes. I own their Responsive Theme and have found it very easy to install and configure. The company has excellent support and has been around for many years. They always issue updates to both their themes and plugins, which ensures the products I have bought from them, always work with the latest WordPress Version.

Admittedly, It took a little bit of messing with post purchase to download/upload install and activate.   The instruction videos are for a older version.  It was still easy enough to figure out.  First tests using Responsive theme look great!  cant wait to dig in and see how much it can take!

Review.Titre: Solid Products and Great Customer Care
Review.Contenu: Their product line and attention to the details which users find essential makes this company the best in their field.

I was using a Cyberchimps plugin and neglected to keep my site fully up to date. I logged in to WP after 9mo or so only to find that the plug-in was not integrating properly with my WP install after updating. The responsive blocks I was using had malfunctioned and my website backend was essentially broken. I reached out to Cyberchimps. They responded quickly, asked for my login credentials, went into my site’s backend and fixed all of the issues very quickly. My site is now back up and running with no issues!  Thank you for the excellent tech support / customer service Cyberchimps!

Review.Titre: Easy to install and navigate to make…
Review.Contenu: Easy to install and navigate to make your edits and tweaks. Lots of starter templates and sample content areas. Excellent customer support -- quick and thorough. I highly recommend.

Review.Titre: Download of plugin was no longer available
Review.Contenu: I had been using iFeature Pro for 12 years with great pleasure. It was very nice to work with. Last month, I encountered problems with some previously purchased plugins; the download of one plugin was no longer available! After a few emails with CyberChimps, the issue was quickly resolved

Review.Titre: I have been using CyberChimps since 2014
Review.Contenu: I have been using CyberChimps since around 2014-2016.  I changed to the Responsive Pro last year for our Intranet and am now using it to rebuild our Internet site.CyberChimps is always quick to respond to my questions.They do a good job keeping the themes updated without it being annoying.I think the pricing is reasonable.I recommend them to everyone that asks.

Review.Titre: Have been using the responsive theme for many years
Review.Contenu: Have been using the responsive theme for many years and continue to upgrade my client's sites as the upgrades are announced. Pleased with the service and support offered.

Review.Titre: Easy to use and if you tend to tinker…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and if you tend to tinker with your themes, creating child themes Responsive Pro is your friend. It's designed with child themes in mind. And as such the first professional theme I found that made it easy.

Review.Titre: A really nice theme, easy to import excellent Elementor sample designs
Review.Contenu: I first used CyberChimp's Responsive theme in 2009.It has improved dramatically since then.The sample designs that the Responsive theme offers are excellent and easy to edit with Elementor, a very popular theme builder.
I had trouble with some of my links in my theme. And I have zero tech knowledge. The customer service was excellent. They patiently walked me through the steps and all is working now.

I needed a website and don't really have the skills or patience to develop one from scratch. I got myself a theme from CyberChimps and had no problem installing and changing the content to what I needed - the tutorial videos were amazing.
I have had a great experience using their products, when I contacted customer support for a problem I had, I received a fast response and they took care of the problem!
I've used CyberChimps for all my websites for years. I have no complaints and support is great.
For my purposes, the theme and the addons are a perfect match. I've been with them for more than 7 years.

Great so far. Good choice of themes for Gutenberg/Elementor, depending on your favourite flavour. Satisfied customer

It's not often that you come across a WordPress theme that dramatically transcends the realm of mediocrity and establishes its unique, rich and powerful presence. This Responsive Theme by Cyberchimps is exactly what I've experienced with this particular theme. It truly is a league of its own.Every facet of the Responsive theme reflects the careful and elaborate thought that has gone into its construction. It combines practicality, aesthetics, and customization in such a balanced manner that any business, regardless of size or industry, can effortlessly create a captivating digital presence. Usability is a prime component of any theme, and this one scores exceptionally high. Its intuitive, user-friendly interface revolutionizes the process of building a website. No tangled web of complexities – simple, powerful, phenomenal.In an era where aesthetics and performance go hand in hand, this WordPress theme is spot on. It flaunts an exquisite and contemporary design, complemented by high-speed performance and SEO optimization. It offers an array of design options and customizability, ensuring the creation of unique and motivating visuals.Functionality and features set the stage for achieving your branding and outreach goals. From WooCommerce integration, seamless social media connectivity, multilingual support, GDPR compliance, to responsive design, it's a comprehensive package that caters to all e-commerce needs effectively and efficiently.Customer service and technical support is another area where this theme shines. Cyberchimps team is prompt, knowledgeable, and goes the extra mile to ensure user satisfaction. This is a trait that truly separates good service providers from great ones.At the end of the day, the experience was more than just purchasing a theme - it was about finding a solution that makes your life easier and your business successful. You truly receive value for money and a high return on investment.It's safe to say that if you wish to ignite the growth of your business, to create a stunning and fluid digital experience for your visitors, Responsive Theme is a must-have. It's not just a WordPress theme, it's a game-changing tool for your business.
